titleStmt.title: The clerk's tutor for writing Written and engraved by Edw. Cocker.
titleStmt.author: Hawkins, John, 17th cent.
Cocker, Edward, 1631-1675. Young clerk's tutor for writing.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jo. Streater, Ja. Flesher, and Hen. Twyford. Sold in Vine Court Middle Temple,

notesStmt.note: Engraved t.p. containing a perpetual almanac; six leaves of writing specimens.
"This book is by Hawkins ... and the t.p. only claims the plates, not the letterpress for Cocker"--DNB (concerning The young clerk's tutor for writing, 1st ed., 1660?).
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
This item is identified at reel 22:9 as Wing C4832A (number cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996), and at reel 2265:8 as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) H1174A.
